```{r}
# Intialising the necessary library
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(svglite)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
```

```{r}
#Reading the data file

#This is data from 24hpi & analysis done by Debakshi
dat_deb <- readr::read_csv("/Volumes/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Maruthi_data/Debakshi_salicylate_expt2_data/Salicylate_Exp2.csv")

dat_deb$Timepoint <- NA
dat_deb$Timepoint[grep("2",dat_deb$Name)] <- "24hpi"

#This is data from 48hpi & analysis done by Maruthi (salicylate treated)
dat_maruthi_sal <- readr::read_csv("/Volumes/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Maruthi_data/Debakshi_salicylate_expt2_data/salicylate_maruthi_48hpi.csv")

dat_maruthi_sal$Timpoint <-NA
dat_maruthi_sal$Timpoint <- "48hpi"
dat_maruthi_sal$Status <- NA
dat_maruthi_sal$Status <- "Treated"

#This is data from 48hpi & analysis done by Maruthi (salicylate untreated)
dat_maruthi_ctrl <- readr::read_csv("/Volumes/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Maruthi_data/Debakshi_salicylate_expt2_data/control_maruthi_48hpi.csv")

dat_maruthi_ctrl$Timepoint <- NA
dat_maruthi_ctrl$Timepoint <- "48hpi"
dat_maruthi_ctrl$Status <- NA
dat_maruthi_ctrl$Status <- "Untreated"

colnames(dat_maruthi_ctrl) <- colnames(dat_maruthi_sal)

dat_maruthi <- data.frame() %>% nrow() %>% ncol()

dat_maruthi <- rbind(dat_maruthi_sal, as.data.frame(dat_maruthi_ctrl)) %>% as.data.frame()
#dat_maruthi$NorBCImagevol <- NA
#dat_maruthi$NorBCImagevol <- dat_maruthi$Branches/dat_maruthi$Totalimagedvolume
#dat_maruthi$NorTotal_length <- NA
#dat_maruthi$NorTotal_length <- round((dat_maruthi$Total_length/dat_maruthi$Totalimagedvolume),digits = 4)


dat_deb_temp <- data.frame() %>% nrow() %>% ncol()


dat_deb_temp <- 
  cbind(
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(BC.Length)%>%as.matrix() %>% as.numeric(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(No.Branch)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(BL.avgLength)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(BC.Vol)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(Mean.BC.Dia)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(Mean.BC.CS)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(Imaged.vol)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(BC.vol.frac)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(Timepoint)%>%as.matrix(),
    dat_deb %>% dplyr::select(Type)%>%as.matrix()
    )%>% as.data.frame()

col <- colnames(dat_maruthi_ctrl)
colnames(dat_deb_temp) <- col

#This is data from 33hpi & analysis done by Lakshmi
dat_33_laks <- readr::read_csv("/Volumes/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Tubeness_polarity_33hpi/master_data_33hpi_1.csv")
dat_33_laks <- dat_33_laks[,c(2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,11,12)]
colnames(dat_33_laks) <- col #Renaming the column names

#Combining all the dataframe for 3 timepoints
dat_master <- rbind(dat_maruthi,dat_deb_temp,dat_33_laks) %>% as.data.frame()

#dat_master <- data.frame(lapply(dat_master,as.numeric))

dat_master_all <- transform(dat_master, Timpoint = as.character(Timpoint),
                          Status = as.character(Status),
                          
                          Total_length = as.numeric(Total_length),
                          Branches = as.numeric(Branches),
                          Averbranchleng = as.numeric(Averbranchleng),
                          TotalBCvolume = as.numeric(TotalBCvolume),
                          `MeanBC(tube)diameter` = as.numeric(`MeanBC(tube)diameter`),
                          `MeanBC(tube)crosssection` = as.numeric(`MeanBC(tube)crosssection`),
                          Totalimagedvolume = as.numeric(Totalimagedvolume)
               )


#Normalising the data with the respective images volume
dat_master_all$Total_length_normalised <- NA
dat_master_all$Total_length_normalised <- round((dat_master_all$Total_length/dat_master_all$Totalimagedvolume), digits = 4)
dat_master_all$Branches_normalised <-NA
dat_master_all$Branches_normalised <- round((dat_master_all$Branches/dat_master_all$Totalimagedvolume), digits = 4)
dat_master_all$Averbranchleng_normalised <- NA
dat_master_all$Averbranchleng_normalised <- round((dat_master_all$Averbranchleng/dat_master_all$Totalimagedvolume), digits = 4)
dat_master_all$TotalBCvolume_normalised <-NA
dat_master_all$TotalBCvolume_normalised <- round((dat_master_all$TotalBCvolume/dat_master_all$Totalimagedvolume), digits = 4)

dat_master_all <- transform(dat_master_all, 
                          Total_length_normalised = as.numeric(Total_length_normalised),
                          Branches_normaliseds = as.numeric(Branches_normalised),
                          Averbranchleng_normalised = as.numeric(Averbranchleng_normalised),
                          TotalBCvolume = as.numeric(TotalBCvolume),
                          TotalBCvolume_normalised = as.numeric(TotalBCvolume_normalised)
                          
               )


#Catogerise the data at various time points
dat_24hpi_tubeness <- dat_master_all %>% dplyr::filter(dat_master_all$Timpoint == "24hpi")
dat_33hpi_tubeness <- dat_master_all %>% dplyr::filter(dat_master_all$Timpoint == "33hpi")
dat_48hpi_tubeness <- dat_master_all %>% dplyr::filter(dat_master_all$Timpoint == "48hpi")


write.csv(dat_master_all, file = "/media/lab-admin/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Analysis_sep18/dat_master_tubeness_global.csv")
write.csv(dat_24hpi_tubeness, file = "/media/lab-admin/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Analysis_sep18/dat_master_tubeness_global_24hpi.csv")
write.csv(dat_33hpi_tubeness, file = "/media/lab-admin/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Analysis_sep18/dat_master_tubeness_global_33hpi.csv")
write.csv(dat_48hpi_tubeness, file = "/media/lab-admin/LAKSHMI2/Lakshmi_working_data_new/Tubeness_BC_global/Analysis_sep18/dat_master_tubeness_global_48hpi.csv")
```


```{r}
tes_24_tube <- t.test(dat_24hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_24hpi_tubeness$Status=="Treated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix(), dat_24hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_24hpi_tubeness$Status=="Untreated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix() , alternative = c("two.sided"), paired = FALSE, var.equal = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95)

tes_33_tube <- t.test(dat_33hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_33hpi_tubeness$Status=="Treated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix(), dat_33hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_33hpi_tubeness$Status=="Untreated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix() , alternative = c("two.sided"), paired = FALSE, var.equal = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95)

tes_48_tube <- t.test(dat_48hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_48hpi_tubeness$Status=="Treated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix(), dat_48hpi_tubeness %>% dplyr::filter(dat_48hpi_tubeness$Status=="Untreated") %>% dplyr::select(Total_length_normalised) %>% as.matrix() , alternative = c("two.sided"), paired = FALSE, var.equal = FALSE, conf.level = 0.95)



```

Status1 <- factor(dat_master_all$Status, levels = c('Untreated', 'Treated'), ordered = TRUE)

P <- scale_color_manual(dat_master_all$Status, values = c("#006600", "#CC0099"))

ggplot2::ggplot(dat_master_all) +
  ggplot2::geom_boxplot(ggplot2::aes(Timpoint,Branches, fill = Status1), outlier.color = NA, size = 0.6, alpha = 0.0, width = 0.6, position = position_dodge(1), varwidth = F, notch = F, outlier.shape = NA, show.legend = FALSE) +
  ggplot2::geom_jitter(ggplot2::aes(Timpoint, y = Branches, color = Status1), cex = 2.5, alpha = 0.7, position = position_jitterdodge(0.2,0.2,1.0))  + P +
  ggplot2::theme_bw() + theme(axis.text = element_text(size=14, face = "bold", colour = "black")) + 
  scale_x_discrete(expand=c(0,0)) +
